name: Astlibra: Living proof
storyline:
A hero who has been attacked by a demon in a village and has survived a childhood friend.

I realized that in front of me was a talking bird and a world without humans.

A long story about the adventures of a young man who has real courage and kindness while being tossed by time and fate.
summary: ASTLIBRA -Living proof- is a side scrolling 2D action RPG. It contains various reinforcement elements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and long story. Estimated playtime: 40+ hours
